channel.title: About Golden Items .. .
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "About Golden Items .. ." - I want to know if it's 'random'.

item.title: Re: About Golden Items .. .
item.content:encoded: cashin in and golden story gives pirate hat if you don't have it and after that give 1 of the 9 golden items, always one that you don't have. After getting all 9 these quest give a golden potion (+250 stamina) each time you do it

item.title: Re: About Golden Items .. .
item.content:encoded: It is indeed set up that way. You should also have a Pirate Hat by now.

item.title: About Golden Items .. .
item.content:encoded: Now, with the Cashing In, and a Golden Story, I have 4 times gotten only Golden Items which I don't already have and wanted to know if it's random chance that this has happened, or is is structured like that?
